MAIN_MESSAGE: The electricity supply to your premises may currently be affected by planned work.  You should have received a letter explaining this.  We hope to be able to restore your supplies by 25-OCT-2020 23:59.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld is still ongoing. This is due to difficult working conditions on site and we now expect power to be back on by 11.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:53pm on Sunday, 25 October 2020
